Literature.Title: Trp residues near peptide termini enhance the membranolytic activity of cationic amphipathic α-helices
Literature.Author: Strandberg E, Horten P, Bentz D, Wadhwani P, Bürck J, Ulrich AS

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:8% Hemolysis=4 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:15% Hemolysis=64 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:25±1% Hemolysis=256 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DSM 1116(MIC=2µg/ml),Franconibacter helveticus DSM 18390(MIC=1-2µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis DSM 347(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus xylosus DSM 20287(MIC=16-32µg/ml)
